summary: Email correspondence regarding travel arrangements for a fact witness in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial. The sender requests specific logistical accommodations, including COVID testing for an unvaccinated witness and hotel separation to prevent the witness from encountering the ex-spouse and family of another individual.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The trial referenced is the criminal trial of Ghislaine Maxwell; she is the central defendant.

events.title: Scheduled witness testimony in Maxwell trial
events.description: A fact witness is scheduled to testify in the Ghislaine Maxwell trial, with testimony possibly extending to December 9, 2021.

events.title: Witness preparation
events.description: Planned preparation session for the fact witness before their testimony.

keyFacts: A fact witness for the Ghislaine Maxwell trial is scheduled to testify on or around December 8-9, 2021.
The witness is not vaccinated against COVID-19, requiring a test before testimony.
Specific travel and hotel arrangements are requested to ensure the witness does not encounter their ex-spouse and that family, who are also in New York, indicating a sensitive personal relationship.
The email highlights careful logistical planning by the prosecution or defense team to manage witness interactions and trial proceedings.
